attributes.action: remove the legal obligation to display 'No Smoking' signs at the entrances to enclosed public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ban on smoking in enclosed public spaces has been very well advertised in advance. To insist on signs being displayed at the entrance to every building to which the public have access is unnecessarily heavy handed and environmentally disfiguring.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
